thoughts.text: The 'google' command did not provide any relevant links. I should use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get the hyperlinks from the Middlebury Language Schools Arabic language program page and search for the download link.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting the hyperlinks from the Middlebury Language Schools Arabic language program page will allow me to search for the download link and download the necessary files to start practicing my Arabic language skills.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get the hyperlinks from the Middlebury Language Schools Arabic language program page
- Search for the program download link
- Download the necessary files to run the program
- Use the 'execute_python_file' command to run the program
- Practice the program and improve my Arabic language skills
